external_games.name: Spooky Castle: The Adventures Of Kid Mystic
external_games.url: https://www.twitch.tv/directory/game/Spooky Castle: The Adventures Of Kid Mystic

name: Spooky Castle: The Adventures Of Kid Mystic
summary: When the evil Bobby Khan descended on the peaceful kingdom of Tulipton and stole all the Mystical Orbs, the king was overwhelmed. The orbs were needed to protect the kingdom from the marauding monsters (an unfortunate side effect of building your kingdom in the Monster Wilderness). So with every last knight battling the rampaging hordes, the king could spare only one wizard for a reckless mission to reclaim the lost orbs: Kid Mystic
